title: Copy-to-clipboard shareable published app link (customer UI + admin dashboard)

requirements.summary: Add a customer-facing "Copy link" control in the main header that copies the current URL and shows success/failure toasts.
acceptanceCriteria: A new UI control labeled "Copy link" is available in the customer-facing UI (e.g., in the top header).
Clicking "Copy link" copies the current window location URL (including any hash/route) to the clipboard.
After copying, a toast/notification is shown with English text confirming success (e.g., "Link copied").
If clipboard access fails, show an English error toast (e.g., "Could not copy link") and do not crash.

file_operations.description: Add a small clipboard utility that attempts to copy provided text using the Clipboard API when available, with a safe fallback for older/unsupported browsers, returning a success/failure result without throwing.

Add a clearly visible "Copy link" action to the header (and mobile menu if applicable) that uses the clipboard utility to copy window.location.href (including hash/route) and shows English success/error toasts via the existing sonner toast system.

requirements.summary: Expose the same "Copy link" action in the Admin Dashboard UI so admins can copy/share the current URL with toast feedback.
acceptanceCriteria: Admins can access a "Copy link" control from the admin area UI (e.g., within the Admin dashboard page header or a clearly visible section).
The copied URL matches the current URL as seen in the browser address bar.
Success and failure feedback are shown using English toasts/notifications.

file_operations.description: Add a "Copy link" control in a prominent location (e.g., next to the Admin Dashboard title) that copies window.location.href using the shared clipboard utility and shows English success/error toasts via sonner.
